hey friends I want to talk a little bit about the downside of this right there

a fan that speeds up the drying process considerably right another thing is the
winner and the winner put it in front of a heating vent
that really helps also in the summer you can put it in your car and the heat

the drying process for the the paper mache pieces too so there are several
